actions.text: Committee on Banking ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Banking. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Garn. Without written report.
Referred to Senate Committee on Budget.
Committee on Budget. Reported to Senate by Senator Domenici favorably without amendment. Without written report.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: An original resolution waiving section 402 (a) of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of H.R. 3484.

summary.text: Waives certain requirements of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of H.R. 3484 (George Washington commemorative coins).

titles.title: An original resolution waiving section 402 (a) of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of H.R. 3484.
